import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; import profileImage from './path-to-your-image.jpg'; import awsDeveloperLogo from './path-to-aws-developer-logo.png'; import awsCloudPractitionerLogo from './path-to-aws-cloud-practitioner-logo.png'; const About = () => { return (

About

Hey there! I'm Chirag, a dedicated full-stack web developer with a specialization in cloud technologies. Graduating from Sahyadri College with a degree in Information Science and Engineering, I'm equipped with the skills and knowledge to tackle the digital world's challenges.

When I'm not busy crafting beautiful websites, you can find me:

  • Mastering AWS certifications to stay ahead in cloud computing
  • Debugging code swiftly and efficiently
  • Pushing boundaries through intense problem-solving sessions, often leading to innovative solutions during late-night coding
  • Writing JavaScript and perfecting Python scripts

I'm always prepared for the storms of tech challenges. Whether you need a full-stack developer or a cloud technology expert, I'm your go-to professional!

Certification

With a strong foundation in cloud computing and full-stack development, I hold certifications that showcase my expertise:

AWS Certified Developer â€“ Associate

Demonstrating proficiency in developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications using AWS.

AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner

Showcasing comprehensive understanding of AWS Cloud concepts, services, security, architecture, pricing, and support.

Skills

I thrive on working with a diverse range of technologies. My key skills include:

  • Front-End Development: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Sass for creating dynamic and responsive web pages.
  • Back-End Development: Skilled in Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for building robust server-side applications.
  • Cloud Computing: Experienced in AWS services, including EC2, S3, Lambda, and RDS.
  • Version Control: Expertise in using Git and GitHub for efficient project collaboration and management.

I enjoy exploring new technologies and am always eager to learn and adapt to the evolving tech landscape.

); }; export default About;
